contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Petition of the Board of Probation and Parole is granted; the decision of the Commonwealth Court, 106 Pa.Cmwlth. 466, 527 A.2d 180, is vacated in light of this Court’s decision in Commonwealth v. Threats, 520 Pa. 182, 553 A.2d 906 (1989); and the matter is remanded to the Commonwealth Court for reconsideration.
STOUT, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
